r.d:
This package provides an object oriented interface to GNU Privacy Guard (GnuPG). It requires the GnuPG executable to be on the system.
Though GnuPG can support symmetric-key cryptography, this package is intended only to facilitate public-key cryptography.
This package requires PHP version 5.2.1 or greater.
r.n: First stable release. Changes include: * Fix Bug #15470. Fixes decryption with passphrase when there is more than one decryption subkey. * Fix Bug #15593. Makes decrypt work on signed (compressed) but non- encrypted data. * Improved end-user documentation. (Doc #14645 and Doc #15054). * Coding standards cleanups. * Fixed PEAR continuous-integration testing for real this time.
